text: The 2021 AFC Beach Soccer Asian Cup will be the 10th edition (3rd official edition) of the AFC Beach Soccer Asian Cup (previously the AFC Beach Soccer Championship before rebranding from 2021), the premier beach soccer tournament contested by Asian men's national teams, organised by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). The tournament will take place in Thailand between 18–28 March 2021. A total of 16 teams are expected to participate. The tournament also acts as the qualification tournament for Asian teams to the 2021 FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup in Russia; the top three teams qualify.
